verses.verse: A Prayer <S%H8605><s%> of the afflicted, <S%H6041><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> he is overwhelmed, <S%H5848><s%> and poureth out <S%H8210><s%> his complaint <S%H7879><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer, <S%H8605><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and let my cry <S%H7775><s%> come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee.

Hide <S%H5641><s%> not <S%H408><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> me in the day <S%H3117><s%> when I am in trouble; <S%H6862><s%> incline <S%H5186><s%> thine ear <S%H241><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me: in the day <S%H3117><s%> when I call <S%H7121><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> me speedily. <S%H4116><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> my days <S%H3117><s%> are consumed <S%H3615><s%> like smoke, <S%H6227><s%> and my bones <S%H6106><s%> are burned <S%H2787><s%> as <S%H3644><s%> a hearth. <S%H4168><s%>

My heart <S%H3820><s%> is smitten, <S%H5221><s%> and withered <S%H3001><s%> like grass; <S%H6212><s%> so <S%H3588><s%> that I forget <S%H7911><s%> to eat <S%H4480><s%> <S%H398><s%> my bread. <S%H3899><s%>
By reason of the voice <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6963><s%> of my groaning <S%H585><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> cleave <S%H1692><s%> to my skin. <S%H1320><s%>
I am like <S%H1819><s%> a pelican <S%H6893><s%> of the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> I am <S%H1961><s%> like an owl <S%H3563><s%> of the desert. <S%H2723><s%>
I watch, <S%H8245><s%> and am <S%H1961><s%> as a sparrow <S%H6833><s%> alone <S%H909><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the house top. <S%H1406><s%>
Mine enemies <S%H341><s%> reproach <S%H2778><s%> me all <S%H3605><s%> the day; <S%H3117><s%> and they that are mad <S%H1984><s%> against me are sworn <S%H7650><s%> against me.
For <S%H3588><s%> I have eaten <S%H398><s%> ashes <S%H665><s%> like bread, <S%H3899><s%> and mingled <S%H4537><s%> my drink <S%H8249><s%> with weeping, <S%H1065><s%>
Because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of thine indignation <S%H2195><s%> and thy wrath: <S%H7110><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou hast lifted me up, <S%H5375><s%> and cast me down. <S%H7993><s%>
My days <S%H3117><s%> are like a shadow <S%H6738><s%> that declineth; <S%H5186><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> am withered <S%H3001><s%> like grass. <S%H6212><s%>
But thou, <S%H859><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> shalt endure <S%H3427><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> and thy remembrance <S%H2143><s%> unto all generations. <S%H1755><s%> <S%H1755><s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> shalt arise, <S%H6965><s%> and have mercy upon <S%H7355><s%> Zion: <S%H6726><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the time <S%H6256><s%> to favor <S%H2603><s%> her, yea, <S%H3588><s%> the set time, <S%H4150><s%> is come. <S%H935><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> thy servants <S%H5650><s%> take pleasure in <S%H7521><s%> <S%H853><s%> her stones, <S%H68><s%> and favor <S%H2603><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> thereof.

So the heathen <S%H1471><s%> shall fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H853><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy glory. <S%H3519><s%>
When <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall build up <S%H1129><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> he shall appear <S%H7200><s%> in his glory. <S%H3519><s%>
He will regard <S%H6437><s%> <S%H413><s%> the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of the destitute, <S%H6199><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> despise <S%H959><s%> <S%H853><s%> their prayer. <S%H8605><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> shall be written <S%H3789><s%> for the generation <S%H1755><s%> to come: <S%H314><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> which shall be created <S%H1254><s%> shall praise <S%H1984><s%> the LORD. <S%H3050><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> he hath looked down <S%H8259><s%> from the height <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4791><s%> of his sanctuary; <S%H6944><s%> from heaven <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8064><s%> did the LORD <S%H3068><s%> behold <S%H5027><s%> <S%H413><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%>
To hear <S%H8085><s%> the groaning <S%H603><s%> of the prisoner; <S%H615><s%> to loose <S%H6605><s%> those that are appointed <S%H1121><s%> to death; <S%H8546><s%>
To declare <S%H5608><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and his praise <S%H8416><s%> in Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%>
When the people <S%H5971><s%> are gathered <S%H6908><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> and the kingdoms, <S%H4467><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
He weakened <S%H6031><s%> my strength <S%H3581><s%> in the way; <S%H1870><s%> he shortened <S%H7114><s%> my days. <S%H3117><s%>

I said, <S%H559><s%> O my God, <S%H410><s%> take <S%H5927><s%> me not <S%H408><s%> away in the midst <S%H2677><s%> of my days: <S%H3117><s%> thy years <S%H8141><s%> are throughout all generations. <S%H1755><s%> <S%H1755><s%>
Of old <S%H6440><s%> hast thou laid the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%> and the heavens <S%H8064><s%> are the work <S%H4639><s%> of thy hands. <S%H3027><s%>

They <S%H1992><s%> shall perish, <S%H6><s%> but thou <S%H859><s%> shalt endure: <S%H5975><s%> yea, all <S%H3605><s%> of them shall wax old <S%H1086><s%> like a garment; <S%H899><s%> as a vesture <S%H3830><s%> shalt thou change <S%H2498><s%> them, and they shall be changed: <S%H2498><s%>
But thou <S%H859><s%> art the same, <S%H1931><s%> and thy years <S%H8141><s%> shall have no <S%H3808><s%> end. <S%H8552><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of thy servants <S%H5650><s%> shall continue, <S%H7931><s%> and their seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee.
